db:abstract.db:para: This example creates a C++ plugin extension by subclassing QQmlExtensionPlugin.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = lib CONFIG += plugin QT += qml
DESTDIR = imports/TimeExample TARGET = qmlqtimeexampleplugin
SOURCES += plugin.cpp
pluginfiles.files += \ imports/TimeExample/qmldir \ imports/TimeExample/center.png \ imports/TimeExample/clock.png \ imports/TimeExample/Clock.qml \ imports/TimeExample/hour.png \ imports/TimeExample/minute.png
qml.files = plugins.qml qml.path += $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/qml/qmlextensionplugins target.path += $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/qml/qmlextensionplugins/imports/TimeExample pluginfiles.path += $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/qml/qmlextensionplugins/imports/TimeExample
INSTALLS += target qml pluginfiles
CONFIG += install_ok # Do not cargo-cult this!
